data.title: Simple Cremation Evansville
data.meta_description: David Fischer, 66, of Evansville IN, died May 28,2024. He is survived by his wife of 43 years, Pat; Mark Fischer of Newburgh IN; Danny Fischer (Yvette) of Louisville Ky. David worked at Target (Airway) for the majority of his... Read complete obituary here.
data.text:
David Fischer, 66, of Evansville IN, died May 28,2024.

He is survived by his wife of 43 years, Pat; Mark Fischer of Newburgh IN; Danny Fischer (Yvette) of Louisville Ky.

David worked at Target (Airway) for the majority of his working career.

David was a very mild, meek man. He was one of Jehovah’s Witnesses. He loved people and talking about food as well as the hope of the future the Bible speaks of under God’s Kingdom. We look forward when David will be resurrected (John 5:28,29) and when Jehovah God will make ALL things new (Rev 21:5).
